segments.text: I see the woman completely immersed in drying dishes, seemingly unaware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already standing in the puddle, but she doesn’t even blink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This carefree attitude is astonishing, yet worrisome at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, on the other hand, are engaged in their little heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a rush of disbelief watching the boy precariously balance on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s not even stable; he looks like he could topple at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And there’s his sister, eagerly reaching for a cookie, completely unaware of the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem blissfully ignorant of the potential chaos they are creating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between their excitement and the woman’s oblivion is quite striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they realize how quickly fun can turn into trouble in a kitchen like this.
segments.speaker: PAR
